p: Fucoidans are polysaccharides in M. pyrifera containing sizable contents of L-fucose and sulfate ester moieties with wide-ranging biological activities, such as antiviral, antitumor, immunomodulation, and antioxidant. Fucoidans from M. pyrifera have potent immune-activating effects by influencing human neutrophils, NK cells, dendritic cells, and T cells to enhance antiviral and antitumor responses ( 190).
